title: Coldplay reschedule Wembley Stadium shows over Tube strikes
description: Coldplay, who are touring with their eco-friendly Music Of The Spheres world tour, say it's just not possible to get people to the concert and home again safely, due to the RMT Tube strike.
content:
Coldplay have rescheduled the final two dates of their 10-show run at Wembley Stadium because of strike action on the London Underground.
Rail, Maritime And Transport (RMT) union walkouts next Sunday and Monday make it impossible for fans to get to a... [3817 chars]

title: Boy, 12, dies after falling in park playground
description: The child was seriously injured after falling from park "apparatus", police say, and despite being treated by paramedics, he died at the scene.
content:
A 12-year-old boy has died after falling in a park playground in Cheshire.
He was discovered in Wharton Recreation Ground off Ledward Street, Winsford, Cheshire, at around 6.11pm on Friday, with serious injuries.
It is believed the youngster fell fro... [1005 chars]

title: Tories pledge to get 'all our oil and gas out of the North Sea'
description: The government warns Kemi Badenoch's plans would "only accelerate the worsening climate crisis".
content:
Tories pledge to get all oil and gas out of North Sea
The Labour government has committed to banning new exploration licences. A spokesperson said a "fair and orderly transition" away from oil and gas would "drive growth".

title: Metal Gear Solid back with remake years after Kojima left Konami
description: The first new game in the series in a decade - a remake - has been released, without involvement of the series creator.
content:

title: Tories would maximise North Sea oil and gas extraction, Badenoch to say
description: Conservative leader says it is ‘absurd’ to shift away from fossil fuels and leave ‘vital resources untapped’
content:
The Conservative party will aim to “maximise extraction” of oil and gas in the North Sea if it wins power, Kemi Badenoch is expected to announce.
